p.s: It's good to hear from you.
I hope you are doing well.
How amazing that you have read the newspaper article on School B goes green on our school homepage.
You have asked me what this project is about so I will tell you about it.
School B goes green is a project organized by students and teachers of our school to include themes like climate change into our school routine.
Themes like how to minimized our carbon footprint, reduce water or eat vegan were talked abouton this project.
The students get to know their responsibility towards the climate crisis and how their habits effectaffect it.
The project is inspired by the Fridays-for-future-Movement and takes place at one day of the year.
Students can select a workshop which interested them the most.
They take place at different locations and deal with other issues, for example foodsharing or second-hand clothes.
Even acting workshops are possible to vistitvisit.
As a student I can say that this project is a great opportunity to learn more about climate change, understand your role and discuss with others about it.
I hope I could give you a good insight into this project and maybe you could suggest something like this at your school.
